name: The Last Hope: Dead Zone Survival
summary:
The Last Hope: Dead Zone Survival is an intense storyline game set in an apocalyptic world overrun by hordes of ravenous zombies. As the main character, your sole objective is to survive and find a way to escape the nightmarish chaos that surrounds you.

To endure the challenges ahead, you must undertake daring missions that test your survival skills. Each mission you take can be the difference between life and death.
